data.title: Book Review
data.text:
Publisher's Note

Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

Michael Eckert studied physics at the Technical University in Munich with a diploma in 1976. He received a doctorate in theoretical physics at the University in Bayreuth in 1979. He is currently a senior researcher at the Research Institute of the Deutsches Museum in Munich. Eckertâ€™s major research projects have covered the history of solid state physics, the history of fluid dynamics, and biographies of Arnold Sommerfeld and Ludwig Prandtl.
